insert into t_statistic_baidu (site_id, `date`, `time`, pv_count, visitor_count, ip_count, avg_visit_time, bounce_ratio, trans_count, contri_pv, gran) values (#{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visitorCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ipCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avgVisitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bounceRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contriPv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gran,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_statistic_baidu set site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pv_count = #{pvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, visitor_count = #{visitorCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ip_count = #{ipCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, avg_visit_time = #{avgVisitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bounce_ratio = #{bounceRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trans_count = #{transCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contri_pv = #{contriPv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gran = #{gran,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, site_id, `date`, `time`, pv_count, visitor_count, ip_count, avg_visit_time, bounce_ratio, trans_count, contri_pv, gran from t_statistic_baidu where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
